catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 313
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: crested white bird and crested brown bird perched on the branches of a gnarled, twisting tree with pink blossoms; blossoming tree is intertwined with a willow tree, with a rock between the two tree trunks; low grasses on ground
signed: center R edge: {An\'ei kōgo natsu utsusu oite Yahantei Sha Shunsei} (painted at Yahantei in the summer of 1774. Sha Shunsei)
title: Two Magpies on Willow and Peach Trees
